content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

It's great that you're taking the time to do your research and ask the right questions. This will help you find a mechanic who's a good fit for your project and ensure that your car gets the attention it needs to perform at its best on the track.

Remember to also trust your instincts and pay attention to how the mechanic communicates with you. Do they take the time to answer your questions and explain their process in detail? Do they seem knowledgeable and confident in their abilities?

By doing your due diligence and finding the right mechanic, you'll be able to enjoy your car's new suspension upgrade and have peace of mind knowing that it was installed and tuned by a professional who cares about delivering exceptional results.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you the best of luck with your project, and I hope you'll be tearing up the track in no time!
